subject: Re: Book suggestions for translation.
msgSnippet: ... I ve finished translating the book and have just uploaded it to :files/texts.  If you read it please notify me of any mistakes.  Thanks.
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "peter_r_guinness" <bacedif@...> wrote:
>
> --- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "peter_r_guinness" <bacedif@> wrote:
> >
> > I'm thinking about translating another book to QS for use as beginner's practise reading material. ....
>
> Ok, so I've decided that I shall translate "The Wizard Of Oz". ....
>

I've finished translating the book and have just uploaded it to :files/texts. If you read it please notify me of any mistakes. Thanks.
